metadata.title: CVE-2024-40921 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: bridge: mst: pass vlan group directly to br_mst_vlan_set_statePass the already obtained vlan group pointer to br_mst_vlan_set_state()instead of dereferencing it again. Each caller has already correctlydereferenced it for their context. This change is required for thefollowing suspicious RCU dereference fix. No functional changesintended.
